scripts.build: npm run model-build && tsc && vite build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: pdm-fe-v$REPO_VERSION && git add -u . && git commit -m pdm-fe-v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag pdm-fe-v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.invcf-dev: npm run check-aws-profile && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E13ASBZ7GUSTLJ --paths "/*"
scripts.invcf-stg: npm run check-aws-profile && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id AAA --paths "/*"
scripts.invcf-prd: npm run check-aws-profile && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id AAA --paths "/*"
scripts.configure-dev: npm run check-aws-profile && npm run repo-tag && sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.configure-stg: npm run check-aws-profile && npm run repo-tag && sls deploy --stage stg
scripts.configure-prd: npm run check-aws-profile && npm run repo-tag && sls deploy --stage prd
scripts.publish-dev: npm run reset && npm run publish-quick-dev
scripts.publish-stg: npm run reset && npm run publish-quick-stg
scripts.publish-prd: npm run reset && npm run publish-quick-prd
scripts.publish-quick-dev: echo PUBLISH:dev && npm run publish-quick && echo 'serverless deploy' && serverless client deploy --no-delete-contents --no-config-change --no-policy-change --no-cors-change --no-confirm --stage dev && npm run invcf-dev
scripts.publish-quick-stg: echo PUBLISH:stg && npm run publish-quick && echo 'serverless deploy' && serverless client deploy --no-delete-contents --no-config-change --no-policy-change --no-cors-change --no-confirm --stage stg && npm run invcf-stg
scripts.publish-quick-prd: echo PUBLISH:prd && npm run publish-quick && serverless client deploy --no-delete-contents --no-config-change --no-policy-change --no-cors-change --no-confirm --stage prd && npm run invcf-prd
scripts.publish-quick: npm run check-aws-profile && npm run build && npm run test && npm run repo-tag
